channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CASSANDRA-11077] Set javac encoding to utf-8
item.description:
CASSANDRA-10661 introduced some utf-8 characters on the test suite, so compilation is failing on Windows which does not use utf-8 as default encoding

build-test:
    [javac] Compiling 407 source files to C:\Users\Paulo\Repositories\cassandra\build\test\classes
    [javac] C:\Users\Paulo\Repositories\cassandra\test\unit\org\apache\cassandra\index\sasi\SASIIndexTest.java:1032: error: unmappable character for encoding Cp1252
    [javac]         update(rm, comment, UTF8Type.instance.decompose("ΓôêΓôàΓÆ║ΓÆ╕ΓÆ╛ΓÆ╢Γô?ΓÇêΓÆ₧ΓÆúΓÆ£ΓÆ¡ΓÆ« and normal ones"), System.currentTimeMillis());

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
This patch specifies utf-8 encoding on all javac entries of build.xml.

trunk
patch
dtest
testall
